subdisciplines.name: Natural Language Processing
subdisciplines.description: The application of computational techniques to the analysis and synthesis of natural language.

subdisciplines.name: Speech Recognition
subdisciplines.description: The process of converting spoken language into digital text or commands.

subdisciplines.name: Speech Synthesis
subdisciplines.description: The process of generating spoken language from digital text.

subdisciplines.name: Language Generation
subdisciplines.description: The process of generating natural language text from non-linguistic input, such as data or other forms of structured information.

subdisciplines.name: Machine Translation
subdisciplines.description: The use of computer algorithms to automatically translate text from one language to another.
